alert.note: Alert for Cochise (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dust Advisory issued March 20 at 2:45PM MST until March 20 at 3:45PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tucson has issued a * Dust Advisory for... Northeastern Cochise County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 345 PM MST. * At 244 PM MST, a dust channel or blowing dust was 13 miles east of Bowie, or 16 miles west of Steins, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...Less than one mile visibility with strong wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Detected by National Weather Service meteorologists. IMPACT...Hazardous travel. * This includes Interstate 10 between mile markers 375 and 391. Locations impacted include... San Simon. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Blowing dust brings reduced visibility, leading to dangerous driving conditions. If driving, avoid blowing dust if possible. If caught in dense blowing dust, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.
